EmailTemplate.name: 21_CustomerSuccess_Wahlberg_Email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Mark Wahlberg picks Honeywell to future-proof his Global Express
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
How do you future-proof your business aircraft?
Ask Mark Wahlberg. The international movie star, producer, entrepreneur and devoted family man just upgraded the cockpit and cabin connectivity capabilities of his personal Global Express – with a little help from Honeywell and Standard Aero.
Click here <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3akoGuiAyQE]]> to find out how – and why – he made his ride safer, more efficient and more comfortable.
